name: 2024 the 7th International Conference on Education Research and Policy (ICERP 2024ï¼‰
content: Publication: After a careful reviewing process, all accepted and presented papers will be published into ICDEL 2024 International Conference Proceedings Series by ACM (ISBN: 979-8-4007-1680-5), then submitted for Ei compendex and Scopus index. All accepted and registered in previous ICERP 2023 were published and indexed by Ei compendex and Scopus successfully.
